example: Bias means the model favors certain answers.
Unsupervised learning finds patterns without labels.
Few-shot learning works with just a few examples.
comment: Покажи один раз — и модель попробует повторить.

example: Attention helps models focus on important words.
comment: ИИ тоже любит слушать только важное.

example: Tuning hyperparameters improves model results.
Multimodal models work with text and images.
Regularization helps avoid overfitting.
Conversational AI chats with users.
Fine-tuning adapts the model to a specific task.
comment: Как довести чай до идеальной температуры.

example: Knowledge graphs organize facts.
Artificial intelligence is changing the world.
comment: Без него ваш холодильник не будет умнее кота.

example: Embeddings turn words into numbers.
Overfitting means the model memorizes too much.
GPT can write poems, emails, or jokes.
comment: Не отвечает на звонки, но пишет хорошо.

example: Seq2seq models translate languages.
Sampling selects outputs randomly.
comment: Кому выпадет шутка, а кому — научный текст.

example: Tokenization splits text into smaller pieces.
Transformers make translation apps smarter.
Zero-shot learning needs no examples to solve tasks.
Neural networks mimic the human brain.
NLP helps computers understand people.
Underfitting means the model learns too little.
Pretraining gives the model basic knowledge.
comment: Модель сначала учится всему подряд, как школьник летом.

example: Text classification sorts emails as spam or not.
Reinforcement learning teaches robots to play games.
Deep learning is used in self-driving cars.
comment: Даже ИИ не знает, почему это работает.

example: Models learn from training data.
comment: Где модель подчерпнула всю свою мудрость.

example: Optimizers help models improve faster.
comment: Прокачка ИИ: быстро и без боли.

example: Tokenizers split sentences into tokens.
comment: Дробит текст на кусочки, как шоколадку.

example: Text generation creates new stories or answers.
Perplexity measures model confusion.
comment: Когда ИИ немного не в себе.

example: Beam search finds the best answer among many.
comment: ИИ не идет наугад, выбирает путь.

example: Self-attention lets models focus on different words.
BERT helps Google understand your search.
Gradient descent finds the best solution step by step.
Large language models write texts like this one.
comment: Знает больше анекдотов, чем ваш дядя.

example: Batch size is the number of samples processed at once.
Language models complete your sentences.
Prompt engineering helps get better results from LLMs.
Machine learning helps computers recognize cats in photos.
comment: Теперь компьютер тоже может отличить кота от собаки.

example: Parameters define how a model behaves.
An epoch is one round of training.
The loss function shows how wrong the model is.
Activation functions add non-linearity to models.
Data augmentation creates more data for training.
comment: Когда данных мало, но очень хочется.

example: Inference is when the model answers your question.
Type a prompt to get a response from the chatbot.
Transfer learning lets a model use old knowledge.
Supervised learning uses labeled data.
Backpropagation teaches the model from its mistakes.
